def hex_hash(code):
    return sum(int(d) for c in code for d in hex(ord(c)) if d.isdigit())

def hex_hash(s):
    return sum(sum(int(c) for c in hex(ord(c))[2:] if c in "0123456789") for c in s)

def hex_hash(code):
    return sum(int(d) for c in code for d in f"{ord(c):x}" if d.isdecimal())

def hex_hash(code):
    return sum(sum(int(d) for d in hex(ord(c)) if d.isdigit()) for c in code)

def hex_hash(code):
    return sum( int(d) for d in ''.join(map(hex, map(ord, code))) if d.isdigit() )

def hex_hash(code):
    return sum( int(d) for d in ''.join(hex(ord(c)) for c in code) if d.isdigit() )
